thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 28 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bringspring Science and Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 20 pct to 50 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bringspring Science and Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 20 pct to 50 pct

organizations.name: bringspring science and technology co ltd

text:
Jan 29(Reuters) - Bringspring Science and Technology Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 20 percent to 50 percent, or to be 16.2 million yuan to 25.9 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 32.4 million yuan
* Says decreased income from main business and increased expenses are the main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/JKk9Pg
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
